channel.title: No Synthetic Chemicals on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in No Synthetic Chemicals on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: No dig with Charles Dowding, showing his fourth summer at Homeacres
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVY4SJt4mzg Charles Dowd Published on Jul 30, 2016 The result of using mulches to transform 3⁄4 acre (0.3ha), from weeds and grass to intensively cropped vegetables for market on 1⁄4 acre, using organic methods, no synthetic chemicals. Plus I show you the fruit trees, flowers, compost heaps, undercover spaces and dig/no dig trials. Camera and editing by Edward Dowding https://edowding.net. For a written summary of this approach, see my Diary http://www.
